item.title: Algorithmic trading & Quant finance
item.description: Max Dama - Quantitative trading summary The boy’s guide to pricing and hedging Max Dama on Automated Trading Jane Street - Probability & Markets Ed Thorp - A Perspective on Quantitative Finance What is Algorithmic Trading Collected HN comments on quantitative trading The Accidental HFT Firm IAMA 100% automated independent retail trader. I trade around 800k to 1.5 million shares a day and make 2cents/trade on average. AMAA How I made $500k with machine learning and HFT What quant funds actually do - TL;DR: no, it isn’t Technical Analysis Numerai nuclearphynance espressolover collected posts High-frequency Trading and Exchange Technology Online Algorithms in High-frequency Trading Creating an HFT Strategy Three short clips about Renaissance Technologies Renaissance Technologies
